attributes.action: broadcast England test matches free for all to see
attributes.additional_details: Test match cricket is a national treasure and should be seen by all for free, the same as the England football matches. Children need too see sports too want to play them and while the England team is playing so well there is no better time too introduce them to test cricket. I don't care who broadcasts it just let the people see it for free. This is just about test matches not one day or 20/20. Test matches are like Wimbledon and should be free for all
